title: The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst
fullTitle: The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst (TV Series 2015â€“2015)

items.question: What has happened to Robert Durst?
items.answer: Robert Durst was convicted of Susan Berman's murder in October 2021 and sentenced to life without parole. That same month he was charged for the murder of his wife Kathleen McCormack, but he died in prison in January 2022 before that trial could begin. This documentary was instrumental in bringing him to justice.
